backend/main.mo: Defines math game domain types, comparison helpers, authorization mixin, and in-memory maps for user progress, profiles, and times-tables data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of major frontend files covering routing, styling, game logic, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining theme tokens for light/dark modes and applying background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint into a root div.
frontend/public/videos/README.txt: Instructions for placing educational MP4 videos with required filenames and recommended formats.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router with age-group guards and page routes wrapped in the global layout and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that captures runtime errors and displays a friendly recovery screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/game/AnswerPad.t: A numeric keypad component that collects number input and submits it via a callback.
frontend/src/components/game/DifficultyS: Renders a card with radio options for selecting a difficulty level.
frontend/src/components/game/FeedbackBan: Displays a success or error banner with an icon and randomized message.
Defines help topic metadata including IDs, titles, video files, and fallback explanations.
frontend/src/components/help/HelpVideoCa: Shows a help video for a topic with fallback text if the video fails to load.
frontend/src/components/layout/KidLayout: Page layout with background, navigation, age badge, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeade: Centered page header with title, optional subtitle, emoji, and mascot.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Wrapper that constrains page width using preset max-width classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SelectedA: Fixed badge showing the currently selected age group using context data.
frontend/src/components/mascot/Mascot.ts: Displays an animated mascot image with fallbacks based on mascot state.
frontend/src/components/nav/MainNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with route buttons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/progress/StarsRo: Renders animated star icons showing earned versus total stars.
frontend/src/components/progress/Sticker: Grid-based sticker board that displays earned stickers with image fallback handling.
frontend/src/game/difficulty.ts: Defines difficulty options, maps frontend to backend difficulty, and provides difficulty multipliers.
frontend/src/game/questionGenerator.ts: Generates math questions with number ranges based on age group, game type, and difficulty, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
frontend/src/game/roundEngine.ts: Manages round state, answering, progression, completion checks, and computes final round results including stars and time spent.
frontend/src/game/timesTables.ts: Builds times table data and generates times-table questions, with optional difficulty-based question counts.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines shared types for math questions, round state, round results, and feedback states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login flow, identity state management, and AuthClient setup via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useProgress.ts: Tracks local progress for game attempts and exposes backend progress when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query for profiles, results, progress summaries, rewards, and times table stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useStickerRewards.ts: Manages local sticker reward storage and awarding logic based on completion count.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimesTablesPractic: Stores and updates times table practice settings, score, attempts, and difficulty in local storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for success and warning colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitySelectPage.ts: Displays selectable math activities and difficulty options, storing difficulty and navigating to the chosen activity.
frontend/src/pages/AgeSelectPage.tsx: Shows age group options and updates the selected age group before navigating to the activity selector.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Lists help topics and renders video cards for learning resources.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the main menu for games, times tables, help, and progress, adjusting navigation based on age group selection.
frontend/src/pages/play/PlayRoundPage.ts: Manages gameplay for a round: generates questions, tracks answers and progress, handles feedback, difficulty, and stores results in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/play/RoundSummaryPage: Loads the stored round result, displays performance summary, awards stickers, updates progress, and syncs results to backend if authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user progress, including stars, activity stats, and earned stickers for the selected age group.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to change age group and manage authentication using Internet Identity, with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/times-tables/TimesTab: Displays a selectable multiplication table and shows equations for the chosen table with navigation between tables.
Provides a tabbed interface to switch between learning and practicing multiplication tables.
Runs times tables practice sessions with chosen tables and difficulty, checking answers, giving feedback, and recording stats.
frontend/src/rewards/stickers.ts: Defines sticker reward metadata and provides a deterministic reward selector based on completion count.
frontend/src/state/ageGroup.ts: Defines age group metadata and utilities for converting between frontend and backend age group enums.
frontend/src/state/AgeGroupContext.tsx: Stores and provides the selected age group using React context with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/theme.ts: Contains theme configuration describing colors, typography, and design guidelines for the kids math app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and component styles for a pastel, kidâ€‘friendly UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known regressions, and required features for restoring UI screens, styling, mascot animations, and sticker rewards.
